MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Falkirk Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.15am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.56am on Tuesday 23rd February 2021..
